articles.title: Chris Rock denies apologising to Jada, Will Smith - P.M. News
articles.description: American comedian Chris Rock who was slapped at the Oscars denies apologising to Will Smith, his wife Jada Pinkett
articles.content:
American comedian Chris Rock who was slapped at the Oscars has denied offering an apology to Will Smith, his wife Jada Pinkett, and the organisers of the Academy Awards.

articles.title: RRR wows international audience, reviews say ‘all American films are lame now’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ram Charan, Jr. NTR and Alia Bhatt-starrer RRR has been receiving a positive response from the international audience. The film was released on March 25.

articles.title: US added 431000 jobs in March in sign of economic health - Business News - Castanet.net
articles.description: America’s employers extended a streak of robust hiring in March, adding 431,000 jobs in a sign of the economy’s resilience in the face of a still-destructive pandemic and the highest inflation in 40 years.

articles.title: Colorectal cancer screening FAQs: Get tested for the ‘almost totally preventable’ disease - TCPalm
articles.description: Colorectal cancer will kill over 52,500 people in 2022, according to American Cancer Society projections. Here’s why you should start screening at 45.
articles.content:
